(Errr...Code...previously when Wrath and Kamodia or something like that, 
sorry I can't remember the names, attacked the Ark, Ramhorn set all 
non-Maximals on enemy, so if the People's Group approached the Ark in 
whatever the defense's range was, the defenses would open fire on them and 
not let them inside, I believe that is a correct assumption on my part.  I 
have spoken with RgDaN, none of the People's Group are allied with the 
Maximals, nor is that group.  So they would be subject to the defenses 
"wrath" if you will)
